Q3.question: Would you say that the country is going in the wrong direction or going in the right direction?

Q4A.question: In general, how would you describe the present economic condition of this country?

Q4B.question: In general, how would you describe your own present living conditions?

Q5A.description: Country's economic condition compared to 12 months ago
Q5A.question: Looking back, how do you rate economic conditions in this country compared to 12 months ago?

Q5B.description: Country's economic condition in 12 months’ time
Q5B.question: Looking ahead, do you expect economic conditions in this country to be better or worse in 12 months’ time?

Q6A.question: Over the past year, how often, if ever, have you or anyone in your family gone without enough food to eat?

Q6B.question: Over the past year, how often, if ever, have you or anyone in your family gone without enough clean water for home use?

Q6E.description: How often gone without cash income

Q7A.description: How often felt unsafe walking in neighbourhood

Q7B.description: How often feared crime in home
Q7B.question: Over the past year, how often, if ever, have you or anyone in your family feared crime in your own home?

Q91A.description: Source of water for household use
Q91A.question: What is your main source of water for household use?

values.2: Piped water into yard, plot, or compound
values.11: Purchased from a cart with a small tank or drum
values.13: Surface water, like a river, dam, lake, pond, stream, canal, or irrigation channel
